headers.name: Content-Security-Policy
headers.value: default-src 'self'; base-uri 'none'; object-src 'none'; frame-ancestors 'none'; script-src 'self' 'wasm-unsafe-eval'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: blob:; font-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' http://localhost:* https://icp0.io https://*.icp0.io https://icp-api.io https://horizon-testnet.stellar.org https://horizon.stellar.org https://*.stellar.org; worker-src 'self' blob:
